content:
Queen Maxim visited the Aardenburg Military Rehabilitation Center in Dorn, where treatment and Ukrainian wounded.

About thisreportedThe official site of the royal family.

Queen Maxim spoke with the Ukrainian military who recover in Dorn, as well as their rehabilitation doctors, physiotherapists and dentures.

The wounded fighters with complex conditions receive specialized assistance at the rehabilitation center.

The Aardenburg Military Rehabilitation Center is the Ministry of Defense of the Ministry of Defense in the field of rehabilitation, professional rehabilitation and orthopedic agents.

The Center offers rehabilitation treatment for soldiers so that they can again fully participate in society.

Asreported the armyinform, the Prime Minister of the Netherlands was that a large number of shells would be sent to Ukraine in the near future.
title: The Queen of the Netherlands visited Ukrainian soldiers at the rehabilitation center
